Content: For an organization to be founded within a system, it should have free
space in one of its colonies (or enough privatley owned resources to
construct a space station or enough fitting buildings to be
consolidated (private mines may be consolidated into a private mining
mega-corp, cloisters inta monastic order), a large population with a
shared interest (so for example a large religious population for a
priesthood), no big population opposing the formations (atheists for a
